title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The issue involves multiple redraws of the entire client area when appending multiple lines to StyledText in word wrap mode.
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: There should be, at most, one redraw for each visible line when appending text.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application in word wrap mode.
2. Append multiple lines to the StyledText component.
3. Observe the number of redraws in the entire client area.
